content.detailedDescription: On the morning of september 27th a we were parked outside the hopital we were building called pornuef medical center. as we were waiting for work to begin a 7a.M. we usually get to parking early around 620a.M. so it was still very dark in th e morning. from our position the hopital sits on top of a hill and you can see the town of pocatello and the mountains behind heading towards utah. being a navy veteran and a ufo enthusiast im always looking up at the sky for unidentified objects. on that morning i looked out to the mountains towards utah, as i was looking a white light suddenly appeared virtually out of nowhere. it came down, and settled on a flight pattern too low to be a satellite. as i observed this object i realized it had no navigation lights which are common among manmade flying objects as we all know. this was the first red flag that alerted me as this is a tell tale sign that what i was looking at might be a ufo. i looked over at my work partner and was telling him what i was seeing in the sky, he sleepy didnt even bother to look. as i kept watching this object i realized i had binoculars under the passenger seat as i had attended a college football game on sat in boise. i looked through the binos and at this time it had moved across the sky slowly flying toward idaho falls. it did not look like a plane as there is a small airport in pocatello and idaho falls which is what initially what i thought. upon gazing at this vehicle through the binos it looked like a ferris wheel with white lights around it. i could not see the center of it but did notice the lights. i became convinced it was a ufo and not a plane or helicopter, it had no nav lights on it what so ever. i was very excited about the sighting and told everyone i worked with and even drew a picture of it. everyone was skeptical about it and most made fun of me. since then ive been looking at pictures of ufo's and have not seen a ufo that fits this description. also the year before this sighting i was in shelby, montana visiting family around july the 11th at about 1030p.M. we were at a fair in shelby. when everyone left as it is a small town i was waiting for my brother inlaw and a friend to return to the vehicle because we were leaving. i noticed a couple walking to their vehicle and they were looking up at the sky, so i looked and seen a white light with no nav lights too low to be a satellite moving across the sky very slowly. i told my brother inlaw about it, the next day the local paper had an article in it about someone calling the sheriffs department reporting a ufo sighting and that this witness was very excited about it. i showed the article to my brother in law and i told him see i told you i seen something in the sky. im very exited about having 2 sightings in back to back years, i will keep looking up into the sky untill i see another. i did not have any photos of these sightings but am still very exited about it. we are not alone *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Flying object that looked like a ferris wheel with lights around it where the seats would be like a ferris wheel.

content.detailedDescription: At approximatly 7:00pm tonight i decided to step outside for a cigarette. as per usual i figured i go out back and see if it was clear enough to check out some stars, and bam crystal clear sky. so upon scanning the sky i noticed two stars that seemed to move from their location. at first i thought it was a visual perception trick, so i looked around got a fix on some other stars and looked back at the two original stars. dont you know it they did the same thing. so i scanned around the sky again real quick and still none of the other stars were platying this trick on me. now i decided i will focus all concentration on these two stars, and dont you know they were definatly moving. both shown with the intensity of a very bright star, and there was no blinking as with an airplane, or redness as with a satellite. what made the whole thing even weirder was that they stayed the same distance apart the entire time they were visable, which was about 4 minutes moving from a north to southeast diection, and then just flickered out long before we should have been able to not see them. and yes i said we because once i realized what was happening i went and grabbed my roommates just to make sure there was something, and all agree that it was unlike anything they have seen before. this was probably the coolest thing i have seen to date in correlation with my want to beleive, hands down. one of my roomates tried to get a video on his phone but it didnt come out at all :(
content.summary: Two bright lights originating from north traveling southeast

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7:10pm est i stepped outside my kitchen door looking south east. right above me (approx 80 degrees) and to the right i noticed two bright lights, not pulsating, very low (lower than typical airplanes), silent (no noise whatsoever - and being in the country/rural setting with little road traffic we can hear distant noise quite well) and going in a straight line heading south east. these 2 lights were traveling low, and what seemed to be the same speed - almost like they were tethered. at about a 50 degree angle the lights disappeared. i had been straining to check if i heard any noise and didn't hear anything. i thought, if the lights weren't tethered then perhaps the lights were part of a same object. i also thought if the lights were part of an object or objects then their brightness might be explained by the setting sun's reflection however the lights weren't high enough to catch what any remaining sun there was - which wasn't much since the evening darkness was past the dusk. and the lights were bright, like what you'd see from a plane's headlines, but these lights were going away from me. and again there was no blinking or any colors. 

while i was still gazing up (after the lights disappeared) i noticed a distant plane, with blinking lights heading ese continue on it path, and as it approached i heard that plane's engine. 
at this same time i noticed a satellite heading due south, which at my line of sight was at about 45 degrees, which then disappeared at the atmospheric horizon; and a second satellite heading ene caught my eye. both satellites seemed to be traveling at their normal steady speed on their straight lines. 

the 2 lights i saw were not as high an altitude as typical (commercial) planes, and definitely not as high of an altitude as the typical satellites. 
i would love to know if there was a website to check what flights (satellites, planes, etc) were overhead, at my gps. perhaps this is one of the recent nasa or military aircraft projects - if so that'd be so cool to know then i can just marvel at our country's technology and research, instead of thinking it's otherworldly.! any help?
content.summary: Central new york 2 silent bright lights, tethered. 03/07/2011 7pm est heading due west.

content.detailedDescription: During our evening walk, we (three individuals) noticed two rapidly moving objects traveling overhead at about 20,000 to 25,000 feet. both objects were brightly lit and traveling in tandem by a distance of about a quarter mile. no sound was present and no coloured or blinking lights. we frequently see aircraft and these two objects were not airplanes, nor were they satellites.
content.summary: Two rapidly moving objects in tandem seperated by quarter of a mile.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on the deck to finish my half-cigarette with my coffee. i was looking at the stars because they were so visible and the night sky was very clear. then, from the right side, i noticed three small lights moving together in a row. they looked like they were flying about as high as a small private airplane but at a faster rate of speed. as i watched them go by, i couldn't make them out to be a plane, shooting stars, a satellite, or anything that looked familiar. there were no flashing lights and they didn't block out any stars when they went by so i know they weren't part of one solid object. they looked like dim stars flying together. there was also no sound whatsoever. a very clear and quiet night (sunday around 9:50pm est). the orbs were somewhat close to each other, equally spaced out, and flying in a line from north to south across the sky. the sighting lasted for about 7 seconds before the trees blocked my view. i was not drinking. i was not high. after the lights were out of sight, i went inside and told my family "i'm pretty sure i just saw a ufo or three," and explained what i saw. of course they had to dismiss it as a plane or shooting star...
content.summary: 3 dim lights flying low and fast together traveling south across the sky. no sound or flashing lights. flying side by side

content.detailedDescription: The first time i noticed it, it came from the ssw, moved very slowly for 2 hours. ocassionally in moved slightly up and down. continued until it was in the west south west. beyound that would be behind my home. it was at about 45 degrees above the ground. the center of the luminous  was a darker circle. today is march 7th. i have seen the same movement fot 7 nights in a row. i expect it to come tonight. i took a photo.
content.summary: Night - flashing red, blue and green

content.detailedDescription:
During the summer of ���67 i went to a performing arts camp in center bridge, bucks county, pennsylvania.   phil woods conducted the jazz band and was married to chan, former spouse of charlie parker. 
one early evening a girl from the camp and i were headed to a wooded area  and we couldn���t help but notice a bright pulsating light in the sky.   it was miles off and moved randomly within a small section of sky and then it blinked off reappearing instantly in another small section of sky.  from the time we saw it, it steadily got closer. 
we watched it for a few minutes and then started running back to the main house to tell the others.  on the driveway we were met by about 30 students running towards us.  they had seen the light and were running to a high field to get a better look, so we turned around and headed for the field, and it got closer and closer.
it hovered above and down range a little without making a sound.  it looked metallic, with bars of white lights singed with green on the underside edge of the saucer.  i remember thinking that i am looking an aircraft that looked similar to the flying saucer from ���the earth stood still���.
after hovering for about a minute or two it moved to the other side of a tree line.  it did this in a fluid motion, unlike before when its movements in the distant sky seemed like sometimes it blinked in and out of existence.
all of us ran out of the field to the other side of the tree line and there it was hovering closer to us.  this lasted for about 20, 30 seconds and then it moved back over the trees.  we ran back to the field and were awarded again with the craft hovering closer still.
this continued several more times, each time the saucer hovered closer.  when it jumped over the trees again, *(name deleted--cms/sg) and i had had enough so we stayed in the field.   when the saucer flew to the field again it hovered closer to us than it had before.  the others ran back to the field where the ufo continued to hover for a little while and then it started moving off.
content.summary: 30 students interacted with a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This took place last wed, night (march 2,2011)i was coming home with my kids. we turned onto the street leading to my house and i saw the light, looked like from a tower,wasnt moving but very bright. as we got onto my road, i could see it was three lights; it seemed to be coming from the north-west. as we pulled in the driveway, it was basically hovering directly over our rd; our house sits in the middle of a large hill and it seemed to be at the top ofthe hill. this object seemed low, the lights were big. my oldest son(15) and i stood out at the end of my driveway,got a good look at it...Triangular/wide boomerang, possibly flat-iron shaped, with three big/bright lights along the middle (one was red, the other two white) with a small blinking light toward one side (from our view, the left side) it seemed to sit there not moving, and we both mentioned the noise; no noise, just a weird electronic-kind of hum (like dolby noise from cassette tapes? or when youd turn on an old-style tv,that couple minutes of hum?) anyway a couple seconds later, a small plane came along the flight path (from east to west, like i usually see planes do around here) and the object started moving faster, but not at all *fast* and headed to the south, still as low/bright til it disappeared behind the tree line. 
 saturday morning (before noon, march 5), i brought out the trash and watched a solid black helicopter, barely above the tree line, heading in the same direction we saw the *thing* head....I ran in to tell my son, and out the picture window on the other side of the house, we saw two more of the same heading in the same direction.
on a local internet forum back in january, three or four different people reported seeing something over the school area. and that following week, there was a black helicopter circling each one of the schools (which i saw while picking my kids up, and all the kids were talking about it) at the time i didnt think anything about it but now it all seems odd.
content.summary: Lighted triangle hovering low over large hill road. 3 black helicopters in same area days after

content.detailedDescription: At my girlfriends house standing in kitchen looking out back window at the horizon. i noticed a light not very high in sky and it would change colors every 2 to 3 seconds from blue to green to red and it looked like it was wavering back and forth or up and down. kind of like a balloon or a piece of light paper would, if the wind was blowing slightly. this is the second time i have seen this. the first was about 3 or 4 years ago at my moms house around the same time of year and time of night except that time it wouuld go from blue to green to red then dissapear for a few minutes then come back but didn't waver around like this time. i also saw other wierd things years ago on that same night. i have always been interested in ufo's but was skeptical until i had an experience with a "dream" about actually seeing feeling and meeting some "things". i don't know if i was dreaming or if it actually happened. it was very realistic and vivid yet vague when i try to recall details. it was also very terrifying and not really like anything i have ever heard or seen. in short there were five different things. they all looked different from one another. the only thing they had in common was thier color. they weren't gray like people say. they were sort of bluish with a white-gray color all blended together and they glowed like a sea nettle does when you break it if the moon is full. they weren't bright though. it is wierd and hard to explain. i have never really told to many people about it because it is hard to describe and i am not even sure if it was a dream or an actuall event. the lights in the sky for sure happened and this time i pointed it out to my girlfriend who thought it may be a satellite and blew it off. she's the only one i have told in complete detail about the "meeting" i had and she doesn't believe me i think. i would like to go into more detail if possible, but do not really feel comfortable doing it here. (feel free to e-mail me) the main reason i am posting this is to hopefully find out if it was a satellite or if anyone else in the area has came forward about something similar. ------ i noticed it because ever since my first experience i always look at the night sky. the first time i saw it was because i live in the country and on that night the stars seemed closer than usuall if that makes any sense as well?? i lost sight of the light because i got tired of watching it and my girlfriend insisted. when i first saw it i felt relieved in a way that i had seen it again and that someone else was there to see it too. i also felt a little intimidated by the memory of my "meeting" and was actually afraid it may happen again. thankfully it didn't though had it occured again i would know i wasn't dreaming the first time. one final thing i should mention is that there have been fighter jets flying around here lately and that's not very common at least not that i have noticed, so maybe that is an explanation or something. also if the big dipper was behind you at 6 o'clock then this thing wouldve been at about 1 o'clock but from where i was it only looked like it was a few feet off of the horizon.28
content.summary: Floating light like a star that changed color from blue 2 green 2 red wavered in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I observed this object in the middle of the day around 2:00pm while working outside of my home in the country near liberty hill, texas.I observed this object which appeared to be a glowing object for a few  minutes coming from the northeast. it got my attention as most aircraft around here do not come from that direction. observed it for awhile trying to determine what it was. as it moved closer and no definite outline of the object was seen, i decided to go for my camera. had only time for one shot by this time as it just disappeared .It was moving at a slow steady pace and just faded out of sight.

watched for it to reappear but it did not. the image in the picture is as clear as i saw it. was a fuzzy glowing object that i would estimate to be about half the size of a small cessna type aircraft. i am an avid skywatcher and this one was a mystery. never seen nothing like it.
content.summary: Observed this bright lighted object during the day for several minutes before watching it just disappear .

content.detailedDescription: Last night at 10 pm i walked outside and noticed something bright with flashing lights in the sky notheast of the city. it caught my attention because it was really clear out and could see all the stars really well and this thing did not fit in. it was bright and flashing. i went in and got my high powered binoculars and could see it really was flashing red and blue. i can only guess that it was five miles away, approximately. it just stayed there and never moved. i watched it about 20 minutes and then i went in. a few hours later i went back out and it was gone. it was too far away to take a picture of it or break out the hd vidcam. this was certainly not an airplane or a star.
content.summary: Stationary object with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: As i *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) have captured strange images in our clouds/skys,i do know the differents between clouds,camera flash,and exc.Today was nothing new to me.I do know we are not alone.Take a look at these three photo's i am sending you to look at.The circle shaped object was in a cloud and popped out.Plus there is other objects i can't exsplain in these photo's.In photo(0306111209d[1])the cicle shaped object is under the light(middle)in photo(0306111209e[1])i see an object on the left side of light,silver color,which i have more photo's of this object on this day(middle) in photo(0306111209b[1])the object is on the right middle.Then i saw this silver cigar shaped object,which i will send the photo's of the object .In some photo's the images i capture are very strong,they create magic.As i am being as careful as i can be with my work,i will show some.Please fill free to e-mail me back.
content.summary: As i watched this circle shaped object swirl around.

content.detailedDescription:
I was home alone with a 4 mo. old  baby, laying in bed to fall asleep about 10-11pm (late fall 1992), when i heard a weird sound outside. thought it was an airplane at first, sounded sort of like an airplane when it is sub zero outside- it was a warbling sound similar to that a piece of thin metal makes when you quickly bend it back and forth. then i realized it wasn't that cold out. i listened to it for approx. 5 more minutes and when it didn't fade, i got up to investigate.

i looked out several windows walking thru the house, and saw it out of the south and west facing windows in my sunroom. it was a saucer hovering above my driveway, just above a security light pole. 

it was low to the ground, approx 20 ft up, and approx 25 ft across. 
at this point there was no sound. it was a very dark metallic gray/black color, matte or brushed in appearance, not real shiny. barely reflected the light of the security light pole. did not observe windows, but i'm not sure at that angle and dark of night that i would have. did see 5-6 lights in a triangular pattern on bottom. red, blue, yellow, white.

it was not moving at first, and i was really frightened- i felt i was being observed. 

i was really wishing it to go away, and finally after 2-3 long minutes it started to move away very slowly, and it gradually rose maybe 20 feet higher in the sky. it hovered over my pasture for a minute, then moved slowly toward my barn, where my 2 horses were. after a minute over my barn it shot straight west, toward st. francis, then before it left my sight i saw it make a extremely quick left (90 degrees)in the sky, and head south toward elk river. it disappeared literally in 2 seconds.

i talked to my friend in st. francis the next day, and some of her friends had seen it too, though not as close up (in the sky). a reporter for a local news station called to see if i'd go on record and let him interview me, i declined. but it has always stayed with me, and i decided it should be recorded. i did draw the formation of the lights underneath at the time, but unfortunately cannot find the drawing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very dark flat metallic in appearance, approx. 25 ft across. 5-6 various colored lights in a triangle pattern on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard and i was getting ready to go back inside after playing catch with my young brother. i'm not sure what made me look up onto the horizon. immediately after i saw the object, i ran inside and grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look, but i still could not tell what the object was. from the angle i was seeing it, i can only describe it as a long cigar-shaped object with ends that curve downwards , or a saucer-shaped object rotating on a plane parallel to my angle of vision. it slowly lumbered across the starless night sky. i just kept thinking to my self "that is something interesting." it wasn't until afterwards did i start to think that maybe that was a ufo. i finally lost sight after about five minutes when the object move too low in the sky for my to see. this happened five-six years ago so my details are little fuzzy.
content.summary: Object slowly moves across sky as if it has nowhere to go

content.detailedDescription:
Another guy and myself headed up in the mountains west of bridgeport ca. the day before opening day of deer season. i don't remember the exact date but recall the incident clearly. we pitched our tent, built a small campfire, and was settling back when another couple came up the trail in a jeep. they asked if they could camp next to us because of the rocky ground all around. a little while later we were all sitting around the campfire when i noticed a very bright light appear to the southeast of our position. we all put our scopes on it and watched it for app 1/2 hour. it moved around slowly, then vertically and at one point i could see the mountain tops behind it ruling out that it was in outer space. i am a licensed pilot and am familiar with aircraft nomenclature. this object was not anything i have ever seen before. we hunted the weekend and returned home to bridgeport. the following day my employer told me it was in the carson city paper that a "ufo" flew low over the power lines leading out of carson city. it was either the fall of 1966 or 1967 the day before deer season opened. 

the second sighting was about 8:00 p.M. in alaska. my brother, and another guy (taxidermist) watched a very bright light move slowly from south to north with two smaller lights circling around it. we watched it for about 3 minutes before we lost sight of it. we were on our way home from a caribou hunting trip and actually stopped the truck to try and see it better. it was silent, not jerking around, and very smooth in the formation. it did not change color.  at no time did we ever feel threatened by either of these objects.

the third time i was in the campgrounds in quartzsite az. talking to some friends on a cb radio about 5 or 6 miles away. all of a sudden they got very excited and started describing this huge object that was wedge shaped that flew right over them on an easterly course. i could not see it due to cloud cover where i was. anyway, the next morning it was reported over phoenix. also i am curious as to why the southwest (i live in yuma,az.) seems to have so many sightings. if i can be of any further help, you can phone me at *(wit's name and phone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Very bright light in sky southeast of my campsite

content.detailedDescription: Waiting for a yoga class a mile outside of town. in the building next to the union restaurant. there was another truck there. i was waiting for the instructor to come back from calling from the union when i looked south east and saw a bright round white light high in the sky. the light started to come straight down at a medium speed. as soon as i saw it coming down i felt like i was going to throw up. turned the truck on to see the time it was 7:00pm. it took approximately 2 minutes for it too come down where the union roof blocked the light. the sky was clear and was looking out of the truck window at it.
content.summary: Sky clear noticed a bright round white light falling straight down at a medium speed .

content.detailedDescription: We see hundreds of these things on a clear night.  this particular one floated close to a radio tower.  i have 100s of hours of video of these things and am sharing this on *(info moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Silent craft hovering by tower

content.detailedDescription: while watching "death at a funeral" this evening, i noticed a white light object traveling at an even speed from west to east. this object was at a fairly low altitude. i would estimate this object to have been traveling at an altitude of between 1500-2000 feet.This object was observed from indoors during the entire duration of the sighting event. i would estimate the speed of this object to be in excess of 400 m.P.H. as i live very near the bismarck,n.D. airport and am quite accustomed to seeing aircraft in flight. i estimate this object to be somewhat small. perhaps the size of a small airplane. this object was of a consistent light intensity during the duration of this sighting. it did not have any f.A.A. lighting configurations. the light was a single light source. it did not blink, flutter pulse or fade until it faded from my view. i ran for and retrieved my video camera as soon as i saw this object was clearly not an airplane and i did manage to capture the object on video tape. i would guess that i filmed it for 15-20 seconds before it faded out of view. this object faded from my view before the horizon( from my perspective). in the filming of this object i framed the window that i observed it through and then zoomed in to get a closer look at the object then zoomed out to give a wide view perspective that included my neighbors house. this video tape will be provided to m.U.F.O.N. field investigators.
content.summary: Fast moving bright white object traveling east

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for my husband as he had to go to work. he works at  [employer removed/cms/tg] for the standing rock sioux tribe as a security officer. when he came home last night he said, "it touched me!" and he was visibly shaken. it took awhile for me to get his story out, but i typed it out as he told me. below is his words. it should be noted that the usual drive from the casino back home takes 90 minutes driving normally. he said this started happening around 11:15 pm but he didn't get home until almost 2 am march 6. he wasn't even aware that this had taken longer than normally and when talking to him he wasn't even aware that there was missing time. here are his words, "sunday march 6 2011
witness , [name deleted/cms/tg] security guard [employer removed/cms/tg]
driving home in car alone after work at about the red lights started about 11:40 pm might���������ve been later than that. the red lights are like softballs, hundreds of them, real light and spinning around the car south of highway 20 and was on highway 63 about 5 miles travelling south to eagle butte. the red balls spun around the car for what seemed like a long time, it was real neat.  the red lights about 100-200 of these red lights and kept going around the car for a couple of miles. they never got super close like 2 car lengths away from me but all around me
after a couple of miles the car was slowing down. i was doing about 60mph but it slowed down to 40mph and wouldn���������t go any faster. then the red lights just disappeared. they didn���������t fly off or anything they just disappeared. the car then went back up to 60 mph like i normally drive it. i just thought it was kind of weird but kind of neat. 
then i got to where a gravel road meets 63 one of the wind block experiment station.. soil erosion experiment (that���������s about 15-20 miles south of timber lake on 63) then i got a feeling of goosbumps all over me. it was tingly cold feeling all over me. then i saw this thing on the side of the road where the gravel road meets the road and before i knew it it was on the car. it reached in and touched my head through the windshield and ran it���������s hand down my back. my back got real hot. 
description of alien:
it had an oblong head, really thin body, thin arms and legs, it was translucent it was glowing like a real dim light bulb cause you can see through it. eyes were size of human, really long nose long in length. it has a really big mouth. it���������s arms were like sticks they were parallel through each other the two sticks looked like it was glowing. it was around 4 foot tall but its arms stretched. 
the other one, on the left hand side of the road had a face like a beast horrifying, ugly, looked wrinkly walked like a squat about the size of a goat. it was glowing too reddish brown.It was wide and narrow. 
and almost as fast as i saw it it was gone (the one on the side of the road)
the one that was on the car it seemed like it was there for awhile because tingly feeling didn���������t go away it felt like it was still there. the tingly feeling lasted about 10 minutes. 
the one on the car it got to the point where i couldn���������t feel or see it anymore,  i didn���������t feel like anything was completely gone until i got to the bison farm (15 miles from eagle butte)
once i reached there was more farm houses everything was gone. 
the car used a lot more gas than it usually does. it was over ��������� tank when started and used over a ��������� tank to get that far on 63.
i know sky was clear but couldn���������t see any stars.
checked [name removed/cms/tg] for marks found none. his head was hot and demeanor was aggitated upon returning home
content.summary: Hundreds of red softball size sphered circling car

content.detailedDescription: I was 7 years old. entire family fishing on a bridge on loop rd in the everglades. we continued fishing after dark the warmouth were biting well. a orange light appeared about 200-300 ft away and slowly approached us. it was silent no smoke no sparks. dad made us pack up and we sat in the car watching it. his hand was on the ignition key as he talked about it with my mother. when the light went out he decided to go to a turnaround point about 1/2 mile away {road was narrow} as we drove towards it the light came on and followed us part way there. we sat at the turnaround point as dad discussed whether we should drive back by it or go the long way around.He finally decided to drive back past it. we drove back to the tamiami trail and there was a car that had ran into the canal . dad never reported the sighting. mom and i are the only two remaining witnesses.
content.summary: Orange light 75 to 100 ft up came within 100-200 ft. silent moving. light went out and back on several times

content.detailedDescription: I was 7 years old. entire family fishing on a bridge on loop rd in the everglades. we continued fishing after dark the warmouth were biting well. a orange light appeared about 200-300 ft away and slowly approached us. it was silent no smoke no sparks. dad made us pack up and we sat in the car watching it. his hand was on the ignition key as he talked about it with my mother. when the light went out he decided to go to a turnaround point about 1/2 mile away {road was narrow} as we drove towards it the light came on and followed us part way there. we sat at the turnaround point as dad discussed whether we should drive back by it or go the long way around.He finally decided to drive back past it. we drove back to the tamiami trail and there was a car that had ran into the canal . dad never reported the sighting. mom and i are the only two remaining witnesses.
content.summary: Orange light 75 to 100 ft up came within 100-200 ft. silent moving. light went out and back on several times

content.detailedDescription: My son came home and told me of something that he saw on his way home.He then went out to the frnt porch and said he can see it .So i went and saw it also, it was just a light in the distance and first thought it was a plane then it moved east then it moved straight up then it caught my attention. i called my wife to see it and it moved toward owr direction .I then was listening for the sound of an engine or the sound of a jet nothing!!! as it came over head we heard a slight hissing sound not like any normal aircraft. then my son and i noticed at the same time what we were seeing was blocking out the stars and was much larger than we thought.It then flew slowly in a southern direction out of sight my son tried to photograph it with a cell phohe it didnt come out. the lights were in a diamond pattern with two red ones trailing.No lights were blinking like normal air craft
content.summary: Saw lights that were not convetional aircraft and didnt move like normal aircraft

content.detailedDescription: An evening after work approximately 5pm a friend and i were traveling on highway 235 towards medora, in. we spotted an orange colored orb very similar to the sun. it was almost directly above white river and appeared to be cloud high. i stopped the vehicle on the side of the road and watched the orb. then another orb appeared. we saw three total, but they would appear and disappear. they also changed speeds, direction, and could remain stationary. they were all three the same in color, shape, and size. im not sure how much time passed as we watched probably ten or fifteed minutes. both of us were sure of what we were seeing, but had no clue as to what it was. we weren't scared or frightened because it was a sunny day with blue skies and a few clouds. i would say we were shocked and amazed because we couldn't explain what we were seeing. finally they just disappeared and we left. there was no visible structure or shape to the objects. no disc, or triangle shape normally associated with ufo's. they just appeared to be orange sun like orbs that moved in ways that i have never seen before. im still not saying we saw something extraterrestrial, but we did see something we cant explain. what i want is someone to tell me what we saw.
content.summary: Sun like orbs that changed speeds, direction, and would disappear and re-appear.

content.detailedDescription: I was living in the fench area on a dead end road in the middle of the wood of arkansas....I was up and doing something and i thought to look out our bedroom window like i would always do for no other reason than a habit and sometimes seen animals at night. wen i looked out i looked to the right and up our drive to the road and then to my left i seen wat i thought for a split second someone coming from beside and or behind our house that only lasted a second the thing i saw was all black from the waist down seem to be tall about 7 feet but what makes it so unbeliveble the head of it was all white no eyes nose mouth chin no neck that i can remeber really almost like it just sat on its shoulders the head was round but egg shaped also no and it seemed to glow but it wasn't giving off and light to anything around it like a light would but it was glowing bright.  it walked from the side, corner of the house and started up the drive wich is about 30 to 40 yards long it walked at a normal pace and i viewed it for about 30 good seconds with no obstruction of view eyes glued on it in amasment at wat i was seeing when it got halfway up the drive there is a huge old tree in the middle seperating the drive once it reached the tree it walked past on the side i couldn't see it just was gone i then tried to get a differnt angle to see if it had took a turn and i just couldn't see it walking in a differnt direction but it was gone i dont understand wat i seen and would realy like to know it you might could give me an answer would love to hear something about it thankyou.....I dont want attention and nothing else just want to know if anyone knows what it might have been and why was it around my house in the middle of no where. very scary
content.summary: Was not ufo was a being of some kind

content.detailedDescription: We were coming out of lions camp in rose valley ojai,stopped at the top of the road and pulled over, turned the car off, and proceeded to have a cigarette, as we were sitting over looking the valley  we were looking straight at the mountain called piedra blanca(white rock) we noticed to the right of us about 25 yards away, there appeared a whitish amberish globe floating about the size of a large exercise ball,it was fading in and out a few times, then dissapeared ,then across the valley over to piedra blanca it appeared again then dissapeared. a few seconds later we saw a craft or ufo the shape of a large saucer maybe 300 feet across with a glass top ,in the glass top was a red ,green, and amber light circling around and around ,this craft started to move in and out of the rocks with this huge plasma glowing light behind it ,i noticed there was no sound at all in the valley ,no sound was coming from the ufo, it was very quiet. as we watched for at least 15 minutes went by when the ufo shot out a gold dust beam of light to the bottom of the canyon then a light from were it had been directed slowly went up the face of the canyon circled around the back side of the rocks and connected back to the main large saucer , it continued to go in and out of the rocks for about another 45 minutes then completely disappeared .In our opinion we think it looked as if they were looking for something in the rocks , maybe gold or some other kind of material or minerals.We would like you to invistigate  pierda blanca in rose valley ojai,california . we also have talked to other people stating they also have seen many things going on in our mountains (las padres national forest) and our skies(ojai)california. thank you for your work and concern please reply back
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disk with glass top and circling red and green and amber lights

content.detailedDescription:
Filmed a (ufo?) during the avalon airshow didn't see it until i viewed some footage later that day, a silver disk shaped object passed over the top of a jet, the object passed at a very high speed and was only visable in 2 frames but at the end of the video you also see another dark object passing by at a very fast speed..

i also took some still shots off the plasma..
content.summary: Did some filming at the avalon airshow just outside melbourne and seen later something odd in the video

content.detailedDescription:
i have been taping the sky here in lake havasu, az. since the beginning of sept. and i knew there was something going on in here.  i've been watching this specific mountain range ever since and it has proved to be extremely interesting.  i was only able to tape about 17 min. because i did run out of tape.  that's is also why i did try to edit it like i did.  my camera isn't the best and also the night sky here is extremely dark.  so i try my best to send what i have and not waste your viewing time with dead air.
     with my reports to seti on nov. 18th, 2010 and the next day, nov. 19, 2010 over this city were 2 black ops military helicopters and jets flying low circling the area trying to find something.  those helicopters are scary looking.  since then, there has been many jets and as of approx. 3 weeks ago (mid feb. 2011).  8 military helicopters again flew over our city, landed at our tiny airport and then i was told they then flew to kingman, az. area.
 
1.  at my home, outside and watching for "blinkies"
 
2.  i couldn't help but notice a bunch of rotating lights especially as far away as they were (3-4 miles)

3.  undeniably the unkown

4.  there were at least 4 huge rotating disc's stationary and they just stayed there pulsating and rating those lights.

5.  i was simply stating: "i knew there was something on that mountain, i knew it!"  (my husband kept telling me it was cars.  there aren't even any roads there.  it's native american land 

6.  i didn't have anymore tape and i finally tired.
content.summary: The very top pulsating lights are of the stationary ufo's" the lights on the left front are of a home . the 5 little lights on the right front are a driveway. the somewhat black mass, between the lights in fore front and the pulsating ufo lights, is the d

content.detailedDescription: I was just looking at the stars with my android sky map app and i noticed about 5 star like lights in a perfect angular formation traveling over me from south east to north west.  it wasn't making any noise that i would have heard if it was a plane especially since it appeared to be flying closer to the ground then airplanes normally would.  it looked also like a silhouette of a perhaps larger stealth structure in the form of a v shaped wing or some large wing typed craft.
content.summary: Saw something glide over me - unsure what the darn thing was

content.detailedDescription:
It was between college jr. and 4yr 1989-90. living in new castle ca. at the time. went to get mail from mail box that was on indian hill road. can see all the way to the bay area from the top of the hill where i lived.  i walked back to the house on a rise above the road, turned suddenly so see a huge, i mean huge white wing rising above the hill out of an abyss that seperates new castle from auburn.  it was so bright.  red marking letters etc on body.  immediately i assumed it was an experiment from the air force base over by chico, ca. i stood with my mought open, never seeing such a thing or even knew they existed. i remember saying aloud " isn't that beautiful". i don't remember how long i stood there, don't know when i stopped looking at it, didn't stay to my knowledge to see it glide down the hill and on if it did go on. didn't hear a sound. didn't tell another sole for some time, months yrs.  

i have looked it up on the internet from time to time with no answer.  when i moved to the state of wa. i worked in a museum.  a fellow came in and i started a conversation with him. don't remember telling him about the wing, i might have. anyway he told me he was one of the men who worked on "the wing".  thats it.
content.summary: Wing

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my dad we're coming back from the other side of the island when we run into a traffic jam. it seemed to be a roadblock. we saw the police lights from far away. as we got closer to the police they weren't stopping anyone, they were just there. as my dad noticed that a police officer was looking at the sky we both just took a glimpse. i noticed around four orange lights emerging from the ground.

i imediantly thought it was a ufo and my dad didn't have any other reaction, but just staring at it and he continued driving. i reached my camera and started recording. by the time i pulled out my camera there were around a dozen of them. my dad then continued driving until he pulled over and the numbers were growing. this is when my dad realized that the sky was full of more than 30 orange lights headed in the same direction.

people started pulling over on the side of the street and they were all amazed. after around 50 ufos floated around the sky they all disappeared in the same spot. afterwards 50 more of those lights started appearing and in the same pattern. all the orange christmas like lights disappeared in the same spot. after that a few more lights went by and they also disappeared. i was exited during the whole event. meanwhile the other people were in shock, scared and amazed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: More than 100 red lights emerge from the ground
